getCurrentValue(uint256).details: Allows the user to get the latest value for the requestId specified

params._requestId: is the requestId to look up the value for

getCurrentValue(uint256).return: bool true if it is able to retreive a value, the value, and the value's timestamp

getDataBefore(uint256,uint256).details: Allows the user to get the first value for the requestId before the specified timestamp

params._requestId: is the requestId to look up the value for
params._timestamp: before which to search for first verified value

getDataBefore(uint256,uint256).return: bool true if it is able to retreive a value, the value, and the value's timestamp

getNewValueCountbyRequestId(uint256).details: Counts the number of values that have been submited for the request
getNewValueCountbyRequestId(uint256).return: uint count of the number of values received for the requestId

getTimestampbyRequestIDandIndex(uint256,.details: Gets the timestamp for the value based on their index

params._index: is the value index to look up
params._requestId: is the requestId to look up

isInDispute(uint256,uint256).details: Gets the 5 miners who mined the value for the specified requestId/_timestamp

params._timestamp: is the timestamp to look up miners for

isInDispute(uint256,uint256).return: bool true if requestId/timestamp is under dispute

retrieveData(uint256,uint256).details: Retreive value from oracle based on requestId/timestamp
